Center of the Universe.name: Center of the Universe
Center of the Universe.blurb: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.
Center of the Universe.description: Innate: Aurelion Sol is constantly orbited by three Stars, each doing a full circumference in 5.25 seconds, and beyond them exists an Outer Limit affecting his damaging abilities.
Center of the Universe.description2: The Stars deal 12 −  120 (based on level) (+ 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 (based on  Celestial Expansion's Rank)) (+ 25% AP)  magic damage and apply spell effects to enemies that come in contact with them, executing  minions below  25 health.
Center of the Universe.notes:
* Aurelion Sol's Stars have independent vision hitboxes, meaning that they may remain visible even while he is within a brush, and must be in the brush themselves in order to be hidden.
 In addition to not being considered to be projectiles for interception purposes, it is possible that his Stars are considered champion summoned units.

 An individual Star must complete at least one third of its orbit before it can damage the same target again. 
 In the event that an enemy orbits around Aurelion Sol at the same rate as his Stars without leaving their hitbox, they will take damage once every third of the way around.
  Stasis from friendly sources (allied  Tempered Fate,  Zhonya's Hourglass, etc.) does not disable Center of the Universe.

Starsurge.name: Starsurge
Starsurge.blurb: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.
Starsurge.description: Active: Aurelion Sol fires the core of a newborn star in the target direction, which expands as long as it remains within the Outer Limit and grants him  20% bonus movement speed.
Starsurge.description2: Upon traveling beyond the Outer Limit, the core detonates, dealing magic damage to all enemies caught within and  stunning them, increased by 0% − 300% (based on time traveled). Starsurge can be recast after 0.25 seconds.
Starsurge.description3: Recast: Aurelion Sol detonates the core early.
Starsurge.description4: If Aurelion Sol is faster than the missile, the missile speed will increase to keep up.
Starsurge.notes:
* So long as Aurelion Sol manages to keep Starsurge within the Outer Limit, it will continue to expand until detonated or out of range, giving this ability the largest range and radius of any ability in the game.
 Both instances count as ability activations for the purposes of effects such as Spellblade and  Force Pulse.
 Starsurge's size grows by 36.67 units per second.

Celestial Expansion.name: Celestial Expansion
Celestial Expansion.blurb: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, magnifying their damage.
Celestial Expansion.description: Passive: The  Stars' base damage is increased.
Celestial Expansion.description2: Active: Aurelion Sol  pushes his  Stars out to the Outer Limit, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their total damage by 50%.
Celestial Expansion.description3: Upon reactivating or after 3 seconds, the stars retract and grant Aurelion Sol 40% bonus movement speed, decaying over 1.5 seconds
Celestial Expansion.notes:
*Celestial Expansion does not apply Muramana's Shock passive.
 Due to being an extension of his innate, crowd control that inhibits the use of abilities will also disable Celestial Expansion and put it on cooldown.
 Although  stasis from friendly sources ( Tempered Fate,  Zhonya's Hourglass, etc.) does not disable Celestial Expansion.

 Toggle-able abilities do not count as an ability activation for the purposes of effects such as Spellblade and  Force Pulse.
 Toggle-able abilities heal for up to 25 health per second when purchasing  Rod of Ages.

Comet of Legend.name: Comet of Legend
Comet of Legend.blurb: Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can take off flying for a long distance.
Comet of Legend.description: Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his  Stars and  takes flight in the chosen direction. While in flight Aurelion Sol is  ghosted, has  unobstructed vision and can ignore terrain collision.
Comet of Legend.description2: If Aurelion Sol takes damage from  champions or  turrets, or is  immobilized, Comet of Legend will instantly end. Comet of Legend can also be canceled by issuing a movement command or reactivating the ability after 1.5 seconds.
Comet of Legend.description3: Comet of Legend cannot be activated for 4 seconds after Aurelion Sol has been damaged by a champion or turret.
Comet of Legend.notes:
* Effects that instantly cancel  Comet of Legend.
  Stopwatch and  Zhonya's Hourglass.
  Hextech Protobelt-01.
  Flash.

 Effects that can be activated during  Comet of Legend without cancelling it.
 Every other item effect (including  Hextech GLP-800).
  Starsurge.

Voice of Light.name: Voice of Light
Voice of Light.blurb: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.
Voice of Light.description: Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of starfire in a line, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit,  slowing for 2 seconds and  knocking targets back to the Outer Limit if they are within.
Voice of Light.notes: * If Aurelion Sol is  displaced while casting, Voice of Light fires from the updated location.
